titleInfo.title: Irving and Arthur Hayutin Seated in a Goat Cart

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4.5 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''Hayutin Children, 1924, Irving age 6, Arthur age 3.''

mods.abstract: Irving (age 6) and Arthur (age 3) Hayutin sit together in a small cart drawn by a goat in front of their childhood home on Denver's west side. Irving wears a cap and Arthur wears a hat and coat. The cart is inscribed with the words, ''Denver 1924.'' Irving and Arthur, who both became attorneys, were the sons of Morris and Anna Ginsberg Hayutin and the brothers of Peryle Hayutin Beck.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 100.
Donated by Peryle Hayutin Beck in December 1976.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
